fuck it

Is a review even necessary? Half-Life 2 is iconic, it brought so any people into the world of PC Gaming. It's a masterpeice, no matter how many time you play the game over and over again, it never gets boring. The story is told not through words, but through the enviroments. You don't hear the story, you expirience it. The characters are fun and memorable and are relatable in an unrelatable enviroment. All in all, its the best.
Шедевр по всем показателям. А про то, как Half-Life 2 воспринимался в 2004-м, я вообще молчу.
The half-life of uranium-238 is about 4.5 billion years, about the time when half life 3 will come out.

好玩不贵买买买！！！！

怎么说呢？很早的时候，家里还没有电脑，在表姐的电脑上玩了一个横板的半条命，那时候算是接触了一点点的半条命了吧，到初中时候家里买了电脑，玩CS的时候发现CS文件夹里面有张图片里面有个有着“入”标志的人感到有一些眼熟，然后就是在一些游戏杂志上不时的看到半条命的字眼，我记得是有个读者互动来信说他学生时期到游戏城买的第一个游戏是半条命：蓝色行动，这就是我对Half-Life的全部了。

然而我真正的玩过正作还是因为前段时间黑五买了V社大包，然后由于以上的伪情怀和好奇，我还挑了个年代近的HF2下来玩，几天前通关了，只想感叹为什么没有早点玩到它！！！！

总体来说，这个游戏没什么缺点，画面精美，节奏轻快，剧情层次清晰，每种道具都和当前关卡紧密相关。是射击游戏也是解谜游戏，是科幻游戏也是惊悚游戏。还有里面的成就系统能够让你能把这个游戏当超级玛丽一样每个砖块都撞一下。

另外，全程中文配音和字幕也是满满的好评。

所以，买买买！！！
If I could forget this game jsut to be able to play it again for the first time I'd do it an in instant.
说实话我没那么多信仰，拖沓的流程，剧情没多少全是在杀怪。我真是强忍着通关的，和1代比相差太多。
Recomendable al 100%, aunque es importante jugarlo y empezar el Episodio 1 cuanto antes para no perder el hilo.

Playing HL?
Why not? lol

Nic dodać nic ująć. Wciel się w legendarnego Gordona Freemana, łap łom i ruszaj na przygodę swojego życia w grze adventure FPS, której nigdy nie zapomnisz. Nie jest to bezmyślna strzelanina, zaś świetnie złożona i skłaniająca do przemyślenia działań gra. Największym plusem jest niewyobrażalny klimat (a to moim zdaniem jest najważniejsze w dobrej grze) połączony ze świetną fabułą, sklejony fantastycznym wykonaniem. Może liniowa oraz bez setek broni, ale czy naprawdę to jest teraz w grach najważniejsze? Chwyta za serce, pobudza myślenie i zmusza do polubienia Gordona, mimo że nie odezwię się on do nas ani słowem :).

This is still goty worthy.

I'll tell you a story.

Once, I went to my grandma's house in March- the THIRD month of the year. It was also the THIRD. I arrived at my grandma's house at 3:33. She has THREE houses on her block. I went up to the door, which had THREE chips on it, and knocked THREE times. After THREE seconds, she said: "Be right there!"- it had THREE words in it. She came up to the door and took off THREE locks on her door. She invited me into the kitchen for cookies, while all of her THREE cats ran past me, one of which had THREE spots on him. She told me to sit down next to the table, which had THREE chairs. She handed me the platter with THREE cookies on it, and said that her THREE cats took THREE of the cookies THREE times. So we sat down for THREE minutes, and talked about THREE subjects: Major companies, Games, and Numbers. After that, we sat in my grandma's living room, and watched THREE different channels. After a while, she started to get thirsty, so I generously got up from one of the THREE sofas, went into the kitchen, and opened the fridge. I spilled THREE drinks, but I got more for my grandma. When I came back into the room, she was watching a commercial for a product that said: "If you don't get it in THREE days, it's free! Only $33.33!" I sat down and started reading a magazine for children- the THIRD issue. It was on how to add. 1+1-1+1+1=3. That didn't seem appropriate for a children's book, so I went on the computer in my grandma's bedroom, and found out the company had been in buisiness for only THREE years. Now it made sense. It was time for me to leave because I was going to a party with THREE of my friends. My grandma gave me THREE seashells as a present, which I thanked her THREE times for. So then I left out the door, walked to my car, and drove away.


So, what I'm trying to say is that I had a great time at my grandma's house.

Great game

Half Life 2 es un juego prácticamente atemporal, las texturas, el agua, las armas, todo se ve todavía muy bien, y es que este juego a envejecido de manera gloriosa y es un recordatorio de "COMO DEBEN HACERSE LAS COSAS" para los nuevos desarrolladores "TRIPLE AAA", el sonido envolvente 5.1, es el mejor que he experimentado en mi vida, simplemente es real,  el cuidado en los detalles de este juego es exquisito y encima con el mod Synergy podemos recorrer la aventura en cooperativo, ¿Qué más puedes pedir?... que ya saquen Half Life 3 por favor jajaja que ya es hora de que alguien de un ejemplo de como innovar en los fps y no vendernos los juegos por pedazos(ahora los llaman dlcs y contienen un mapa de deathmatch y 2 pistolas). Si no conocías este juego, déjame decirte que es mejor que muchos juegos actuales, y después de jugarlo, nunca verás el FPS de la misma manera, NUNCA.

This is one of those games that makes you wanna complete every single one of the achivments, and it got a storyline that makes you glued to the screen until you finish the game, and you will probably buy and play EP1 and 2 after... but after you've finished those, you'll be joining: "The Waiting For Half Life 3 Group" aka Half the world

Half-Life 2.... with 2003 graphics also called ,,Sorce Engine'' was the best game engine ever maded.I like the  gameplay and psyhics...I think is no game like Half-Life 2. I like the storyline, the weapons, enviroment and the city....Also Half-Life 2 have's many gameplays:
Chapter 1:A first person footage.
Chapter 2: A travel in canals
Chapter 3: Travel to Black Mesa East with different obstacles.
Chapter 4:A Horror game
Chapter 5: A course with a car with many obstacles and insect(antilons)
Chapter 6:A jump game where you stay on the rock and jump though the sand.
Chapeter 7:Entering in a prison called Nova Prospekt.
Chapter 8:The objective is to find a man called Eli Vance
Chapter 9: Fight against the MetroPolice and Combine Force
Chapter 10:Epic warl scene at the City Hall
Chapter 11:Entering in the tallest tower ever maded in history with 2.5 Km tall called (Citadel)
Chapter 12: Look inside the citadel and you are 100% astonished and 
Chapter 13:Take the Super gravity gun
Chapter 14: Kill Dr.Brenn
Chapter 15: Credits
14 games in 1
Soundtrack: 10/10          Maps: 9.5/10         Graphics: 10/10       Psyhics 9.5/10       Weapons 10/10         Storyline ....(infinite)......

One of the best games Mr Freeman.

This game is truly amazing. Before I could ever play it, I saw the trailers from 2004. I was only 8 or 9 years old at the time and only had a PS2. I was finally able to play HL2 some time later and this IS the greatest game ever made! Now I don't know what was available at the time this was released. But this has a great story that makes you feel like you're part of the world. Great gameplay, part of this has to do with not having gigantic HUD blocking half the screen, Or stupid cover mechanics.  and the thing that really shocked me at the time was how well the characters words synced with their lips. The first time I was able to play was when I bought the orange box in 2008.. (When new games were $50 and not f*king $60) I had the whole trilogy (minus hl1 series) I beat HL2. I wanted more, so I played EP1, not as great but it's still pretty good. I played EP2, now I really can't decide which one is better HL2 or EP2... HL2 was definitely a longer game with more areas. But EP2 steals the cake when it comes to leaving a gaping HL2 hole in my heart. It's been 8 years and no news.. I don't really care but the more I think about it the more I want a sequel lol.

It's boring, all you do is walk and shoot enemies with crappy guns, even some Valve employees admit that the gameplay is very dated. There isn't much plot that would make you want to keep going. The first Half-Life was good because you knew what you wanted, it was about escaping Black Mesa while aliens and the government wanted to kill you, you felt alone and the atmosphere was great. Now you feel like you're just wandering aimlessly around some city without even knowing why. Not to mention that the cancellation of Episode 3 makes this game even more uncomplete than it already is.
Half-Life 2 has a sense of orginality to it, continuing the story from the original Half-Life series with more weapons and enemies, including the enemies from the classic Half-Life.
